article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

From a health system with a world wide reach to a new events center under construction in Sioux Falls, the Sanford name seems like its just about everywhere.

They're all named after Thomas Denny Sanford, a businessman turned philanthropist who plans to die broke.

This week on inside KELOLAND, we sit down with Sanford to talk about his past and his legacy.
